turkish_example_sentence: Biz, bu acil durumda panik yapıp aceleci kararlar düşünmememiz lazım.
english_example_sentence: In this emergency, we should not panic and think of hasty decisions.
russian_example_sentence: В этой экстренной ситуации нам не следует паниковать и принимать поспешные решения.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz, bu acil durumda panik yapıp aceleci kararlar ______.
